author: bencomic

right.text: i was in the room at the time.
wait, so you were in a room where this was happening? and that doesn't sound an alarm? like there was a dude in the room fucking a stuffed animal PHYSICALLY THERE

left.text: i wasn't watching, per se, i was aware of the activity

title: three gay men and a barney toy, part 2
